roleset.name: to involve, connect, or imply, connection or implying
roleset.note: IMPLICATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'implicate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from implicate.01-v predicate notes)
IMPLICATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with implicate.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from implication.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The conversation was taped [*-1] by federal investigators in what Mr. Lang said [*T*-2]was an effort [*] to get Mr. Lorin to implicate Mr. Laff .

example.name: passive
example.text: Capcom Futures is a Chicago subsidiary of Capcom Financial Services Ltd. , a London financial firm that [*T*-2]-1 was implicated [*-1]last year in a scheme [*] to launder drug money .
example.arg: in a scheme [*] to launder drug money

example.text: The case depended on his implication of his co-workers in the fraud.
